com.indeed.status.core

Interface StatusUpdateListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDependencyManager, AbstractStatusUpdateListener

    public interface StatusUpdateListener
    Callbacks which receive notification of changes to dependencies. You can add a StatusUpdateListener to a StatusUpdateProducer, such as AbstractDependencyManager or DependencyPinger. Note that the order in which callbacks are received isn't strictly defined so you should not rely on any particular call ordering when implementing the callback methods.
    Author:
    matts
    See Also:
    AbstractStatusUpdateListener

        result - The result of the check.
